Title: HTML5 UP Dopetrope ASP.NET MVC Template
Description: An ASP.NET MVC website template using the HTML5 UP Dopetrope style template.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
An ASP.NET MVC website template using the HTML5 UP Dopetrope style template.



If you are looking to use the HTML5 UP Dopetrope style template within an ASP.NET MVC application, then look no further. I have already done the initial leg work of stubbing out MVC Razor views and putting together an ASP.NET MVC website using this awesome template.
  • Fully Responsive
  • Built on intelligent HTML5 + CSS3
  • Super Customizable
  • 100% Free!

A special thanks goes to @n33co for creating the HTML5 UP templates and especially for making them FREE!!

The original, pure HTML5 and CSS3 HTML5 UP templates can be found at http://html5up.net


This project is created by Chris Pietschmann.
